name: Edelweis Coin
description: Edelweis is an AI-driven smart financial infrastructure platform that connects on-chain networks with real-world assets (RWA) through a programmable trust protocol. It enables users to activate AI Agents for automated strategy execution, multi-chain liquidity scheduling, and yield optimization. By combining AI automation, blockchain transparency, and RWA integration, Edelweis offers a secure and efficient yield collaboration network for both retail and institutional participants. Its core token, EDC, powers governance, rewards, and access to premium protocol features, ensuring active participation and sustainable ecosystem growth.
